tool_description: API to provide a list of vetted professional sellers for any category.
name: Fiverr Pro services
title: Fiverr Pro services

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: List of category names you can search for
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fiverr-pro-services.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fiverr-pro-services.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fiverr-pro-services.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fiverr-pro-services.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
